name: Burning Ass
description:
Burning Ass - A Race for Survival


Step into a world of deadly traps in "Burning Ass", a thrilling multiplayer game where survival is the ultimate prize.

Navigate through treacherous landscapes teeming with intricate challenges designed to test even the most seasoned players. Be the first in this desperate race for water, the lifeblood of this dying world.

Unravel the Mysteries:

Hidden hints whisper forgotten secrets, their solutions scattered across each treacherous level. Decipher cryptic clues and unlock the truth behind the world's enigmatic past.

Master the Deadly Dance:

Razor-sharp blades, crushing gears, and sharp spikes, demanding precise timing and split-second decisions. Only the swift and the skilled will survive.

The Final Rush:

Be the first to cross the finish line, outrun the dangers, and outsmart your rivals. Claim your reward - a precious bottle of water - and secure your right to live another day.
But remember, survival is just the beginning. As you conquer challenges and unravel the mysteries, a deeper truth awaits. Will you crack the code and unlock the secrets of this enigmatic world, or will you succumb to its deadly embrace?

"Burning Ass" awaits. Are you ready to face the challenge?

Blood, Gore, Fun
